languages.text: {n}Живой символ Империума взирает на вас словно бы с негодованием на фривольный жест. {petname} позволяет вам коснуться своего оперения, однако вы не дожидаетесь какой либо ответной реакции.{/n}
{n}The living symbol of the Imperium gazes at you with seeming indignation at the frivolous gesture. {petname} permits your touch, but you can tell that no further reaction will be forthcoming.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Живой символ Империума взирает на вас словно бы с негодованием на фривольный жест. {petname} позволяет вам коснуться своего оперения, однако вы не дожидаетесь какой либо ответной реакции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The living symbol of the Imperium gazes at you seemingly with indignation at your frivolous gesture. {petname} permits your touch, but you can tell that no further reaction will be forthcoming.{/n}

{n}The living symbol of the Imperium gazes at you seemingly with indignation at your frivolous gesture. {petname} permits your touch, but you can tell that no further reaction will be forthcoming.{/n}

{n}The living symbol of the Imperium gazes at you with seeming indignation at the frivolous gesture. {petname} permits your touch, but you can tell that no further reaction will be forthcoming.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帝国の生ける象徴は、軽薄なジェスチャーに憤慨しているかのようにあなたをじっと見つめている。{petname}はあなたの接触を許しているが、それ以上の反応は期待できないだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The living symbol of the Imperium gazes at you with seeming indignation at the frivolous gesture. {petname} permits your touch, but you can tell that no further reaction will be forthcoming.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帝国の生ける象徴は、軽薄なジェスチャーに憤慨しているかのようにあなたをじっと見つめている。{petname}はあなたの接触を許しているが、それ以上の反応は期待できないだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das lebende Symbol des Imperiums starrt dich an, offenkundig empört wegen der unseriösen Geste. {petname} lässt deine Berührung zu, aber du weißt, dass keine weitere Reaktion erfolgen wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The living symbol of the Imperium gazes at you with seeming indignation at the frivolous gesture. {petname} permits your touch, but you can tell that no further reaction will be forthcoming.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das lebende Symbol des Imperiums starrt dich an, offenkundig empört wegen der unseriösen Geste. {petname} lässt deine Berührung zu, aber du weißt, dass keine weitere Reaktion erfolgen wird.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le symbole vivant de l'Imperium répond à votre geste frivole en vous lançant un regard indigné. {petname} accepte votre main, mais vous sentez que vous n'obtiendrez aucune autre réaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The living symbol of the Imperium gazes at you with seeming indignation at the frivolous gesture. {petname} permits your touch, but you can tell that no further reaction will be forthcoming.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le symbole vivant de l'Imperium répond à votre geste frivole en vous lançant un regard indigné. {petname} accepte votre main, mais vous sentez que vous n'obtiendrez aucune autre réaction.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El símbolo viviente del Imperium te clava una mirada de aparente indignación por tu frívolo gesto. {petname} se deja tocar, pero adviertes que no reaccionará bien a ninguna otra acción.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The living symbol of the Imperium gazes at you with seeming indignation at the frivolous gesture. {petname} permits your touch, but you can tell that no further reaction will be forthcoming.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El símbolo viviente del Imperium te clava una mirada de aparente indignación por tu frívolo gesto. {petname} se deja tocar, pero adviertes que no reaccionará bien a ninguna otra acción.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帝国的象征紧紧地盯着你，似乎对你这轻浮的举动感到愤慨。{petname}允许你触碰它，但你看得出来，它不会再有任何进一步的反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The living symbol of the Imperium gazes at you with seeming indignation at the frivolous gesture. {petname} permits your touch, but you can tell that no further reaction will be forthcoming.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帝国的象征紧紧地盯着你，似乎对你这轻浮的举动感到愤慨。{petname}允许你触碰它，但你看得出来，它不会再有任何进一步的反应。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İmparatorluk'un kanlı canlı sembolü, laubaliliğine içerlemişçesine sana bakıyor. {petname} kendisine dokunmana göz yumuyor fakat ötesine izin vermeyeceğini anlıyorsun.{/n}
